content:

### Deployments & Changes
- Validated audit worker scaling rollback; maintained one extra worker to keep p95 ingest lag near 10s.
- Reduced MFA reset backlog by adding triage tag for device replacement vs enrollment failure; improved median response time by 1 minute.
- Sent reminders for remaining open attestation items; flagged 6 nearing SLA breach.
- Answered auditor questions on token retention and rotation cadence; provided additional log excerpts.

### Events
- Post-walkthrough follow-ups completed.
- MFA reset backlog reduced.
- Remaining open attestation items reviewed.
- Audit worker scaling rollback validated.

### On-Call
- Shift: S. Haddad. 2 pages. 14 tickets. Status: Stable; follow-ups completed and staffing adjusted.
